statements: SELECT * FROM customer_segments WHERE segment = 'VIP';
SELECT customer_id, email, segment FROM customer_segments WHERE interaction_history IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customer_segments ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT customer_id, segment FROM customer_segments WHERE purchase_history->'$.total_amount' > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customer_segments WHERE segment IN ('Platinum', 'Gold');
SELECT * FROM customer_segments WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY segment DESC, email ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_id, segment FROM customer_segments WHERE segment = 'VIP' AND purchase_history->>'$.total_amount' > 1000 ORDER BY customer_id
SELECT customer_id, email, JSON_ARRAY_LENGTH(purchase_history) AS num_purchases FROM customer_segments WHERE JSON_ARRAY_LENGTH(purchase_history) > 3 ORDER BY num_purchases DESC, email ASC
SELECT * FROM customer_segments WHERE segment IN ('Bronze', 'Silver') AND interaction_history->'$.last_interaction_date' >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY interaction_history->'$.last_interaction_date' DESC
SELECT segment, COUNT(*) AS segment_count FROM customer_segments GROUP BY segment HAVING COUNT(*) >= 2 ORDER BY segment_count DESC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT purchase_total FROM customers ORDER BY purchase_total DESC;
SELECT email, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Email' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE purchase_total > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_total DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE first_name LIKE 'S%' AND last_name LIKE 'D%';
SELECT customer_id, email, purchase_total FROM customers WHERE purchase_total BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY purchase_total ASC;
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Email' OR interaction_type = 'Phone Call' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, i.interaction_date FROM customers c JOIN interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id WHERE i.interaction_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY i.interaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, total_purchases FROM customers WHERE total_purchases > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT segment_name, criteria_description FROM segments;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, total_purchases FROM customers WHERE total_purchases > 1000;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Purchase' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, segment_name FROM customers c JOIN segments s ON c.customer_id = ANY(s.segment_members) WHERE s.segment_name = 'VIP';

SELECT customer_name, total_purchases, interaction_date FROM customers c JOIN interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY total_purchases DESC, interaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_type, interaction_details FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, product_name, price FROM purchases WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT segment_name FROM segments WHERE segment_id < 5;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name;
SELECT customer_id, address FROM customers WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%' AND address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT c.first_name, p.product_name, p.price FROM customers c INNER JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id;
SELECT s.segment_name, COUNT(*) AS total_customers FROM segments s JOIN customers c ON s.segment_id = c.customer_id GROUP BY s.segment_name;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE total_purchases > 5;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE total_amount > 100;
SELECT customer_id, segment_id FROM customer_segments JOIN segments ON customer_segments.segment_id = segments.segment_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE total_purchases > 100 ORDER BY last_interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%' AND last_name LIKE 'D%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, p.total_amount FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.total_amount > 500 ORDER BY p.total_amount DESC, c.first_name ASC;

SELECT c.customer_id, c.email, s.segment_name FROM customers c JOIN customer_segments cs ON c.customer_id = cs.customer_id JOIN segments s ON cs.segment_id = s.segment_id WHERE s.segment_name = 'Gold Members' ORDER BY c.customer_id ASC;
SELECT MAX(p.total_amount) AS max_amount, MIN(p.total_amount) AS min_amount, AVG(p.total_amount) AS avg_amount FROM purchases p;
